name: A flower and stacking fleshes
description:
Second game from a game a week.
It's one button game genre with simple mechanic. 
Stack blocks to go make it taller.

Control:
- press "down" or "left" click for put down the block.

Gameplay:
- Missing will be game over.
- Number under obstacle mean how many block that need to stack before allowing to eat obstacle.

Note: Ending area around 130 M.

Version 1.0.4:
- fixed game crash for stupid reason. I forgot to put data in array of levels and cause index out of bound. :')
- adjust difficulty.
